title: Ep. 71: 'Atlanta'
description:
Chris Ryan and Andy Greenwald preview Donald Glover's 'Atlanta,' the best new show on TV, and discuss how refreshing it is to have a series take place "today."
      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
